fields.title: Part 2
fields.summary: <p><em>Much has been said about Witches. It would be foolish to think this was entirely by their design. It would also be rather foolish to assume this has been entirely to their benefit. However, the monumental position that Witches have in human culture is largely by their design</em>...</p>

fields.title: Part 3
fields.summary: <p>This might seem like a skewed perspective of men. In fact, it is simply an example of things as they are. This should not be seen as an indictment of male kind in general. It is simply an indictment of awful people in general. Readers are encouraged to make their own conclus...</p>
